text:
Johnny Depp's gem: Amber

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are just a month away from marking their first wedding anniversary and the Pirates of the Caribbean star has come up with the sweetest compliment for his wife.

The Black Mass actor thanked his wife for putting up with him and for living with all the characters he has played, reports E! Online .

The 52-year-old actor gave his wife this shout-out at the Palm Springs International Film Festival. — ANI
title: Johnny Depp’s gem: Amber
